thread.title: Renaissance Hotels premieres revitalized Renaissance Santo Domingo Jaragua Hotel & Casino
thread.title_full: Renaissance Hotels premieres revitalized Renaissance Santo Domingo Jaragua Hotel & Casino

author: eTN Global Editor
title: Renaissance Hotels premieres revitalized Renaissance Santo Domingo Jaragua Hotel & Casino
text:
Renaissance Hotels premieres revitalized Renaissance Santo Domingo Jaragua Hotel & Casino   Revitalized Renaissance Santo Domingo Jaragua Hotel & Casino in the Dominican Republic   
BETHESDA, MD - Renaissance Hotels, the global lifestyle hotel brand recognized for helping guests discover unusual travel experiences, announced the reintroduction of the Renaissance Santo Domingo Jaragua Hotel & Casino in Santo Domingo, Dominican Republic. 
The property underwent a yearlong $40 million renovation that began in 2014 to completely revamp the property's interior and amenities. Much detail and effort went into the preservation of the hotel's historic aspects and blending them with ultra-modern design elements. 
"Santo Domingo is a historic city in the Caribbean with rich tradition and a vibrant local culture. We are incredibly excited to unveil the renovated Renaissance Santo Domingo Jaragua Hotel & Casino and invite our guests to discover the local flavor of Santo Domingo," said Dan Vinh, Vice President Marketing, Renaissance Hotels. 
Built in 1942, the hotel has played a role in Santo Domingo culture for 73 years.
